overrides.message: High Potential Match. Candidate possesses the majority of required technical skills, significantly offsetting other gaps.
Qualified Match. Good alignment with core technical stack. Gaps may be seniority-related or domain-specific.

tiers.message: Exceptional fit. The candidate's profile strongly aligns with the core requirements.
Strong technical fit with identifiable and learnable gaps.
Moderate fit. Some foundational skills are present, but specific gaps exist.
Partial Match. Candidate shares significant stack overlap but may require upskilling in key areas.

conclusions.defaultMessage: Low match probability. Critical mismatch in core technology stack (e.g. Missing primary language or framework).
